dmca.title: Warner Bros. wants Departed departed from blog
dmca.body:
Re: Unauthorized Use of Warner Bros. Properties:
http://www.moviefree.blogspot.com/
http://www.moviefree2.blogspot.com/

Dear Sir or Madam:

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner
or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain
intellectual property rights, said owner being named Warner Bros.
Entertainment Inc. ("Warner Bros.").

Warner Bros. is the owner of trademark, copyright and other intellectual
property rights in and to the motion pictures entitled 16 Blocks, Blood
Diamond, Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, Happy Feet, Superman
Returns, and The Departed.

Because of these rights, no one is authorized to manufacture,
distribute, copy, sell and/or offer for sale products utilizing the 16
Blocks, Blood Diamond, Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, Happy Feet,
Superman Returns, and The Departed Properties without the express
written permission of Warner Bros.

It has recently come to our attention that the web site located at
http://www.moviefree.blogspot.com/
and http://www.moviefree2.blogspot.com/ are offering content from the 16
Blocks, Blood Diamond, Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, Happy Feet,
Superman Returns, and The Departed Properties.

I have a good faith belief that such content is not authorized by Warner
Bros., its agent, or the law and therefore infringe Warner Bros.'
rights. Therefore, please act expeditiously to remove or disable access
to the above-referenced web site.

Please confirm that you have taken the appropriate action at your
earliest convenience. Thank you for your prompt attention to this
matter and please advise should you have any questions or require any
additional information.

This letter is not a complete statement of Warner Bros.' rights in
connection with this matter, and nothing contained herein constitutes an
express or implied waiver of any rights, remedies, or defenses of Warner
Bros. in connection with this matter, all of which are expressly
reserved.

Sincerely,

/[private]

[private]
Internet Specialist, Anti-Piracy Internet Operations Warner Bros.
Entertainment Inc.
[private]
[private]
Burbank, California 91522
Phone: [private]
Fax: [private]
[private]@warnerbros.com
